note.p: Naval officer. Secretary on the Repulse, 1873. Discharged from naval sick list to the Repulse, 1875. Retired to Wales.

Alphabetical sick list from the Medical and Surgical Journal of Her Majesty’s naval hospital at Esquimalt for 9 March to 31 December 1875 by Matthew Coates, Staff Surgeon (The National Archives ADM 101/283/3 f. 54)
Census returns of England and Wales 1911 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG14/34530/347)
